thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: They Told You So: Stock-Fund Gains Remain Disappointing

author: William Power
title: They Told You So: Stock-Fund Gains Remain Disappointing
text:
Back in January when the stock market was rallying, many analysts cautioned that it likely wouldn’t last.
The ensuing three months have proved them right. Those strong earnings reports that powered the stock market early in the year aren’t having the same effect now. Instead, there are concerns about inflation and how the Federal Reserve will orchestrate interest-rate increases to battle it.
For...
